settings.heading: Hero Infinity Galaxy Turbo Toys Figures: Build, Collect, Conquer
settings.heading1: Assemble the complete Hero Infinity Galaxy Turbo collection! From Hero’s Journey to Clash of Gods, explore 17-point articulated figures, customizable armour, and hidden treasures. Perfect for collectors and fans ages 9+. Collect them all!

settings.text: A "cassette motor" is a type of hub motor that is designed to be compatible with the existing cassette on the rear wheel of a bicycle. This motor is integrated into the rear wheel hub, directly driving the cassette or freewheel. It's a popular choice for electric bicycle conversions, as it allows the e-bike to maintain its original gearing system. This is suitable for open size of 142mm.

settings.context: Browse through our new arrivals for the latest innovation!

settings.heading: Blokees Transformers: Toys, Action Figures, and Collectibles!
settings.text1: Step into the world of Transformers with Blokees' amazing collection. From pocket-sized heroes to towering legends, we have something for every fan and collector. Discover the timeless mini figures in the Classic Class, unbox surprises in our Galaxy and Shining Versions, celebrate Cybertronian history with our Yearly Version Editions, or command attention with our Action Edition giants.
settings.text2: Each figures brings the epic battle between Autobots and Decepticons to life in your hands. Whether you're a seasoned collector or new to the Transformers universe, Blokees offers an exciting journey through time, space, and imagination. Roll out and build your collection today!

settings.heading1: Build Your Heroes, No Mess Required!
settings.subheading1: DIY Assemble Kit Toy – Pure Creative Joy for Ages 12 and Up
settings.text1: Experience the thrill of assembling your favorite Ultraman heroes with Blokees DIY Assemble Kit Toy. No messy glue, brushes, or cutters needed—just pure, simple assembly. This kit, designed for ages 12 and older, features 20 moveable joints for dynamic poses straight from the action-packed Ultraman universe. Immerse yourself in the joy of creation without the fuss, and let your creativity shine.
settings.heading2: Officially Licensed Excellence - Blokees Ultraman Collection
settings.subheading2: Unleash the Power of Authenticity and Quality
settings.text2: Discover the universe of Ultraman with confidence, as Blokees proudly presents the officially licensed Ultraman Galaxy Versions 01-06 collection. Our commitment to quality and safety is unwavering, ensuring each figure meets the highest standards in material excellence. Crafted with precision from premium ABS materials, these figures stand as a testament to our dedication to providing a secure and authentic Ultraman experience.
settings.heading3: Galaxy Versions 01-06: Level Up Your Ultraman Collection
settings.subheading3: Collectors and Fans, Assemble! Secure the Complete Set Now
settings.text3: Attention, Ultra-obsessed collectors! Elevate your fandom to warp speed with the MUST-HAVE Galaxy Versions 01-06 collection. These aren't just action figures, they're gateway portals to epic adventures and coveted Ultraman glory.

settings.title: Olivia
settings.context: My kids are thrilled with the surprise element! Each box is an adventure, and they can't wait to see which character they get. It adds an extra layer of excitement to playtime.

settings.title: TinyHouseMom
settings.context: The size of these playsets is just perfect. Not too big, not too small, packed with features that keep my kiddos busy for hours in transformers beast wars. It's amazing how much fun they pack into such a compact space!

settings.title: PlaytimeGuru
settings.context: Love how durable these sets are! They've survived countless bath times and still look brand new. They don't take up much space, and the quality is top-notch. Thumbs up from this happy parent!

settings.title: BusyDad
settings.context: These playsets are a breeze to use. No funky smells, and everything works like a charm. My little ones can assemble transformers bumblebee without any help, and cleanup is super easy. It's definitely designed for this new generation. A parent's dream come true!

settings.title: CraftyMom
settings.context: Absolutely impressed with the quality of these playsets! The attention to detail is incredible, and I love that they're gender-neutral. My kids are obsessed with all the cool accessories. Definitely a win in our house!

settings.title: Emma
settings.context: My kids love the SOS series! They spend hours building and creating their own adventures. The pieces fit perfectly, and the detailed figures inspire so much creativity. A fantastic toy set!

settings.subtitle: Dive into DIY Adventures, Quality & Community

settings.heading: Blokees Transformers Series: Influencer Spotlight
settings.text: Unbox, Build, Battle, and Beyond with Your Favorite Influencers!

settings.block_text: Share your DIY assembly adventures and display your completed toys using #BlokeesTransformers on social media. Connect with fellow enthusiasts, showcase your creativity！

settings.block_title: What's special about the mystery figure in the Galaxy Version 01 Roll Out series?
settings.block_text: The mystery figure in this series is a metal-finish Optimus Prime, offering a premium, metallic texture that distinguishes it from the rest. It's a unique, high-value collectible for fans and collectors.

settings.block_title: Can Blokees Transformers blocks transform into vehicles?
settings.block_text: While our Transformers blocks are designed for dynamic building and posing, they don't transform into vehicles. They are created to provide a unique and imaginative play experience.

settings.block_title: What material are Blokees Transformers made of, and are they safe?
settings.block_text: Blokees Transformers are made from high-grade ABS plastic, rigorously tested and certified by EU CE, EU RoHS, and Swiss SGS standards. This ensures top-notch quality, safety, and environmental friendliness, from particle quality to color fidelity.

settings.block_title: Are Blokees Transformers sets compatible with other sets?
settings.block_text: Yes, all Blokees Transformers sets are designed to be compatible with each other, allowing for expanded and imaginative building experiences.

settings.block_title: What is the recommended age range for Blokees Transformers?
settings.block_text: Our Transformers series is recommended for children aged 6 and up, providing a perfect balance of fun, creativity, and developmental challenge.

settings.block_title: How does Blokees ensure the durability of its Transformers sets?
settings.block_text: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
